ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not a paladin there. It was just an example about the fact that a language could be useful. I have no example for paladins yet.  :o( On the other hand,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not a paladin there. It was just an example about the fact that a
language could be useful. I have no example for paladins yet. :o(
On the other hand, some agnostic Dark Elves are kind enough. And they can
teach you I'm sure. Not all the Teir'Dals are evil.

Erwin, Paladin of Tunare (Fennin Ro)

From: Dan Kassiday [mailto:kassiday@...]

Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] languages

really and who on rallos zek has been teaching the paladins dark speech?
